sentences.sContent: We have accomplished all we set out to do.
sentences.sCn: 所有计划要做的事情，我们都已完成。

sentences.sContent: (=  we have done what we intended to do  ) .

remMethod.val: ac(表加强) + com(共同) + pl(看作plen， 满) + ish(使) → 共同加强使圆满 → 完成

words.tran: 完成的；熟练的，有技巧的；有修养的；有学问的

trans.tranCn: 达到， 完成， 实现
trans.tranOther: to succeed in doing something, especially after trying very hard
